this is a simply multiplier, programmed in binary, working on 5/20/25
1000000000100000 0000000000000000, 0000001000000000 0000000000000000  MOVi
1000000000100000 0000000000000001, 0000000000000100 0000000000000000  MOVi
0000000000000010 0000000000000010, 0000000000000000 0000000000000001  MULT rTwo, rZero rOne
0000000001001010 0000000000000000, 0000000000000000 0000000000000000  HLT
